name: NSSnapshotEventType
desc: Constants that specify the reason the managed object may need to reinitialize its values.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a snapshot event using a raw value.

items.name: static var undoInsertion: NSSnapshotEventType
items.desc: Specifies a change due to undo from insertion.

items.name: static var undoDeletion: NSSnapshotEventType
items.desc: Specifies a change due to undo from deletion.

items.name: static var undoUpdate: NSSnapshotEventType
items.desc: Specifies a change due to a property-level undo.

items.name: static var rollback: NSSnapshotEventType
items.desc: Specifies a change due to the managed object context being rolled back.

items.name: static var refresh: NSSnapshotEventType
items.desc: Specifies a change due to the managed object being refreshed.

items.name: static var mergePolicy: NSSnapshotEventType
items.desc: Specifies a change due to conflict resolution during a save operation.
